revised_title: Sir Alfred Fernandez Yarrow: A Pioneering Engineer and Philanthropist
tldr: Sir Alfred Fernandez Yarrow was a prominent engineer and shipbuilder who made significant contributions to the development of torpedo boats, destroyers, and marine engineering. He was also a philanthropist who supported industrial research, donating funds to the National Physical Laboratory and the Royal Society. Yarrow's innovations in ship design, propulsion, and materials helped improve the efficiency and performance of naval vessels, while his support for research and education advanced the field of engineering and science.
